thread.section_title: Mark Worthington Jewellers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.markworthingtonjewellers.co.uk | 2 of 36
thread.title: Richard
thread.title_full: Mark Worthington Jewellers reviewed by Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text:
I initially viewed the watch on line whilst in the US and left a small deposit to hold it for 3 weeks. On my return I viewed the watch and it was exactly as pictured. They were very helpful and informative about other brands we talked about whilst there.
When I need another watch I would certainly have no hesitation in using them again.
